Description: The location where Scalr should store Orchestration Log .
Example value(s): scalr = On Scalr server "instance" = On affected instance

Description: The default duration (in seconds) logs should be kept when stored on instances. Users can override this setting in the Farm Designer: Advanced Tab - Orchestration .
Whether the audit log should be enabled.
Unix socket path or IP/Hostname to fluentd for audit log.
Port that fluentd is listening on for the audit log.
Protocol to use when communicating with fluentd for the audit log.
The connection to fluentd will timeout after this time has passed (in seconds) for the audit log.
All audit logs will be tagged with this string.
Whether the API log should be enabled.
Unix socket path or IP/Hostname to fluentd for API log.
Port that fluentd is listening on for the API log.
Protocol to use when communicating with fluentd for the API log.
The connection to fluentd will timeout after this time has passed (in seconds) for the API log.
All API logs will be tagged with this string.
Whether the user log should be enabled.
Unix socket path or IP/Hostname to fluentd for user log.
Port that fluentd is listening on for the user log.
Protocol to use when communicating with fluentd for the user log.
The connection to fluentd will timeout after this time has passed (in seconds) for the user log.
All user logs will be tagged with this string.
